channel.title: Adding a stair?
channel.description: How do i make a working stair ? or a working door? if the door already is in the building, how do i add so it works ? so i can get threw it ?. Answer please.

item.title: Adding a stair?
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“Fox0wnage, post:2, topic:327115”]For the stairs I think you need to make it that if you click that object it takes you up 1 height level.[/quote]wow ur smart

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a stair?
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

For the doors go to door.cfg in your config folder and put the exact coordinates of the door.

For the stairs I think you need to make it that if you click that object it takes you up 1 height level.

Read full topic
